name: Seamless (BLANKdev) (BLANKdev)
description:
Seamless is a 2D puzzle-platformer with a minimalistic style and unique mechanics

Right now we are in a closed beta-testing phase.

There will be an update on this page whenever we are looking for testers, or open a public playtesting period.

You can also join our discord server for updates!

Current team:

  • BLANKdev - Project lead
  • EmInSpace - Level designer
  • neropatti - Programmer/Level designer
